references.reference: Andrea encyclopedic knowledge of network equipment is an incredibly useful resource. He always seems to have time to help and it was a genuine pleasure working with him.
references.name: Michael Gearhardt

references.reference: I worked with Andrea for several years and during that time always found Andrea to be a creative, humble and dedicated colleague. He is keen to learn and keen to apply his knowledge in any environment, always rising to the challenge put before him. When asked to take on large scale projects – such as the production of a series of gameplay – Andrea for his deliverables.
